attributes.action: remove asbestos from ALL U.K.  schools NOW
attributes.additional_details: asbestos is prevellant in our schools, somethig like 90% of our schools have asbestos present, this must be removed NOW before any more children develop mesothelioma in adulthood, and before retired teacher die from asbestos related illness

rejection.details: The Department for Education is responsible for schools in England only.
